data.text: Halli Jisu'n khawa munkha amathaanna Judea ramsuung tiang aleisi, halli Jordan tuidung kha aleirakaanna ama'n mi katamtak kaheiwa ngaidiang matiangnga ileiminchu angnga aleirilpi.
Pharisee lekkhat in ama koolla inheiwa-ah ama surna sik-ah ensuina inleinei. Inmani'n inleirakel, “Natipiro,” “Pasal inkhat in anumei inthenpui nasik ah Dan in zootbe?”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleimasang, “Moses in nangnidiang, angkachang Dan napame?”
Inmani'n inleiti, “Moses in inthenna cheiikha pasalpa in amajia li anumei kha inthenpui sik-ah azoot.” Innidan 24:1-4; Matt 5:31
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni ningmalung ningminngar jarra Moses in hiwa Dan hi ileimajia eii.
Takkha Pathian kutbool inphutna khan pasal khat-um numeisa aleibool. Inphut 1:27; 5:2
Khawa jarra pasal in anu apa mathaanta anumeile inchunsik eii.
Halli inmani inni'n taksa inkhatbit in e-sik eii, khawa jarra inmani inni'n inni etheinunu, takkha taksa inkhat in-esik eii, Inphut 1:27; 5:2
Pathian in iminchun kha manmasi miring inkhat innum minthenthei nunu.”
Ama siamruoi ngai'n inntiang inkir phakhan Jisu diang hiwa jarra inleirakel,
Ama'n inmani diang aleiril, “Tu ka-ang pasal in anumei inthenpui suoli numeisa inkhat anei inchu ama kha anumei takchungnga zool-inthai eii. Matt 5:32; 1 Cor 7:10,11
Hile in-angnga, atu ka-ang numeisa innum aruothar inthenpuili pasal inkhat anei inchu aruothar chungnga zool-inthai eii.”
Mi lekkhat in naipang ngai chungnga akut duongpi nasik-ah Jisu diang inheiruoi, takkha ama siamruoi ngai'n naipang kaheiruoi ngaikha inleiran.
Jisu'n hiwa amu phakhan aleiraangnga inmani diang aleiti, “Naipang ngaikha kei kadiang heiwarasu inmani kha khaapmaru, ajarchu Pathian Rengram kha hiwa ka-ang naipang ngaita eii.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kanati, Pathian Rengram kha naipang inkhat in iralaang angnga ningralaangmak inchu, ama Rengram luutthei nutun.”
Halli naipang ngaikha akakuo chunna, ama'n inmani chungnga akut duongnga rawaan aleipeii.
Halli Jisu'n lamma kasi aheiphutnook phakhan pasal inkhat in aheitaanna ama diang inkunna aleiti. “Katha Karu, hektik kaboi ringkhuo munasik-ah angme kathosik?”
“Angjarra katha tia ninakoime?” Jisu'n ama diang aleiti, “Tuteii katha ommu, Pathian khabit eii katha.
Chongpeii kha nang in najet: ‘Mi kathat emaro; zool-inthai emaro, inruup thomaro, mi ngaikha rilsemaro, maleisei rilmaro, nanu napa kayaro.’ ”
Mipa in aleiti, “Karu” “Hiwa Sinadan rakip ngaihi naipang ka-elaiya inphut kahongjui wiakjei.”

Jisu'n amadiang minriang tak-ah ahei-enna aleiti, “Nang in nathosik Dan inkhat alaom. Si-inlang ninei rakip juor inlang sara ngaidiang sial ngaikha juopero, kha e-inchu marwaan ramma na-inchongsik eii, heikirnook inlang kanuk najuiro,”
Ama'n hiwa chong ajetpha khan, ama maisuokhan kahoimak in sip-ah akirjei, ajarchu ama kha inchongthei mi alei eii.
Jisu'n amit-en minloonna asiamruoi ngaidiang ahei-enna aleiti, “Angtuk intakme inchong miring in Pathian Rengram kaluutsik!”
Hiwa chong in asiamruoi ngaikha ngakna inleinei, takkha Jisu'n inlet-ah aleiril, “Kei kasangai, Pathian Rengram kaluut sik-hi angtuk intakme!
Inchong khat in Pathian Rengram kaluutsik neek achu salaileem inkhat in simphuoi kuorra kaluutsik kha abeidet.” Salaaileem
Hiwa chong hin asiamruoi ngai'n inthiangnga inleingak-ah inmani khatli inkhatdiang inlei-inkel, “Kha e-inchu tume ringna kamusik?”
Jisu'n inmani diang encheiya aleimasang, “Miring ngaisik achu hiwahi etheinuni, takkha Pathian diangchu ethei, ang rakip Pathian diangchu ethei eii.”
Halli Peter in ahongril, “Enro, angrakip kinmathaanna keini'n nang kinnajuijei.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Inthiangnga kei'n nangni diang kanati, atu ka-ang in, in-u innai emakli innu inpa, insangai emakli in-inn inlei kei chongkahoi sik-ah inmathaan inchu,
atuunna ringkhuo hin saruk rajakhat khella inn, ulenai, nu, sa, lei, khat-um poongna ngaihi inmusik eii, halli akahongsik ringkhuo khanchu kumsoot ringna inmusik eii.
Takkha atuunna mi katamtak ma-insa ngai'n nuk inlatongsik eii, halli tuunna mi katamtak nuk intong ngai'n ma inlasasik eii.”

Halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaile Jerusalem lamma insi phakhan, Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai neek-ah ma asa-ah aleisi, anuk kajui ngaikha akachi in aleisip. Jisu'n woikhat inlet-ah asiamruoi ngaikha inteina mun inkhat-ah aminchunna ama diangnga kasuoksik chuon ngaikha arilpinook.

Rangairu, “Ama'n aleiti, Miring Sapa kha Thiampu Kalian khat-um Dan Karu ngaidiang inpenasik mun Jerusalem tiang kasisik ni-eii. Inmani ngai'n Jisu kha kathi sik-ah rahoi suok tina noonkuung pe-inta Zaatlop ngaidiang inpesik eii,
inmani ngai'n ama kha innuipui inta, machilthuon inta, kase-ah wuok inta halli inthatsik eii, takkha nithum huuini ahongring nooksik eii.”
Zebedee sa-ngai James li John in Jisu diang inheiwa-ah inleiti, “Karu,” “Keini'n angme inkhat nang nadiang keini sik-ah kinnaminthozoot inkhat om.”
Jisu'n aheirakel, “Angme ningna minthozoot?”
Inmani'n inheimasang, “Nang in-ongna Rengram poina khan, keini inni khat-in changtiang khat-in weitiang in-ongsik nazootpiro.”

Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, nangni'n ningna rakelna ajarkha jetmakchujei, kei ka-insik poongna rabing kha nangni inmator tunbo? Kei Baptize kathosik angnga nangnileii Baptize thomator tunbo? Luk 12:50
Inmani'n inleiti, “Kinthomator.”
Takkha tume kei kakut changtiang khat-um kaweitiang in-ongsik khachu kei'n kadang matormong. Khachu Pathian in amun iboolpi khat-um ama ikadang mi ngaisik eii.”
Hiwahi anuk kajui aleiilaak soom ngai'n inleijet phakhan, inmani'n James li John diang inleiraang,

halli Jisu'n asiamruoi rakip ngaikha akoolla akoichunna aleitipi, “Zaatlop tia nilei Reng ngai'n inmani roonna rammachu mi rakip chungnga wai inroon, halli inmani lamkakei ngai'n thomatorna rakip innei. Luk 22:25,26
Ang e-innum hiwahi, nangni karrachu etheinuni, hanna nangni karra miring inkhat in akalok ezoot inchu, ama kha mirakip suok esik eii. Matt 23:11; Mk 9:35; Luk 22:26
Halli nangni karra miring inkhat in alukhet ezoot inchu, ama'n mi rakip suok erase,
ajarchu Miring Sapa hi sepa inthosik-ah kajuo emak, sepa katho sik khat-um mipui kasanring sik-ah aringkhuo kapesik ijuo eii.”
Inmani'n Jericho ah inheiwa, halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai khat-um mi katamtak le inheiwa phakhan, bukani mitkacho araming Bartimaeus, Timaeus sapa kha lampui sirra in-ongnga aleiom.
Ama'n Nazareth Jisu eii ti aleijet phakhan, “Jisu! David sapa! kei naminriangro!” tia ama'n inringnga aleikheek.
Mi katamtak in, Omchianro intia ama kha inleiran. Takkha ama'n “David Sapa, kei naminriangro!” tia kheel kheella aleikheek.
Jisu'n alei-ngirra aleiti, “Ama kha heikoiru.”
Khawa suoli apuon adiar ngaikha adeengjuonna, chungtiang inchoomma, halli Jisu diang aheiwa.
Jisu'n aleirakel. “Angme nangsik ah kei ninaminthozoot?”
Jisu'n ama diang aleiti, “Sitro,” “Nang ingamna khan anamindamjei.”
